title: Pond Animals
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: What might you see when you visit a pond? Students have the opportunity to read number words and count animals that live near a pond. High-frequency words, repetitive text, and supportive illustrations make this book ideal for early readers.
meta: ducks, frogs, pond, swans, turtles, worms
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /f/
Consonants : Identify and write the consonant Ff
Number Words : Identify and use number words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
